code: import React from'react';import{useDarkMode}from'./DarkModeContext';import{FontAwesomeIcon}from'@fortawesome/react-fontawesome';import{faMoon,faSun}from'@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons';import'../styling/Header.css';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Header=()=>{const{isDarkMode,toggleDarkMode}=useDarkMode();return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"header_container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("header",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"logo",children:"Tampa Bay Environmentalist"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"toggle-switch",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"checkbox",id:"dark-mode-toggle",checked:isDarkMode,onChange:toggleDarkMode}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{htmlFor:"dark-mode-toggle",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FontAwesomeIcon,{icon:faMoon,className:"icon dark-icon ".concat(isDarkMode?'active':'')}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FontAwesomeIcon,{icon:faSun,className:"icon light-icon ".concat(isDarkMode?'active':'')})]})]})]});};export default Header;
